meanings.definition: The act of disbanding or breaking up a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The disbandment of the club left many members feeling sad.
meanings.sent2: The disbandment of the team was necessary due to lack of funding.
meanings.sent3: The disbandment of the band led to some interesting solo projects.
meanings.sent4: The disbandment of the committee was like the scattering of leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The disbandment of the group was like a puzzle being taken apart piece by piece.
